name: Makrwatch
headline: Scale new user acquisition with YouTube Creators
description:
Makrwatch helps D2C companies scale user acquisition with YouTube creators. Our clients see us as an alternative growth channel to Google/Facebook, by reaching their audience at a more efficient cost per acquisition and obtaining high quality customers that are more engaged. 

Makrwatch has been growing 100%+ year over year, currently processes 2M-5M in billings and helps creators in over 60+ countries. We are reaching 20 team members in 6+ countries, have been fully remote for the past years and aim to reach 20M in billings with 10,000 sponsored videos within the next 18 months.
tags: industry:marketplace; industry:b2b; industry:social-media; industry:advertising; industry:creator-economy; location:new-york

founders.name: Andres Felipe Diaz, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Our focus is to build a high growth company with human-centered values that promote diversity, multi-cultural teams, and that enables global access to wealth. 

We proudly sponsor thousands of YouTube creators in 60+ counties, have team members in 4 continents and 7+ countries and have been fully remote for a few years.

We are also very picky with our clients and want to help companies that have a higher purpose of helping and improving our world.

founders.name: Carlos Saavedra, Founder
founders.description: We are empowering people's creativity towards content creations, working with thousands of creators in more than 60+ countries.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Makrwatch

**Mission**: Makrwatch aims to help D2C (Direct-to-Consumer) companies scale new user acquisition through partnerships with YouTube creators. By acting as an alternative to traditional digital ad networks like Google and Facebook, Makrwatch enables brands to reach their audiences at a more efficient cost while acquiring high-quality, engaged customers.

**Background**: Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator Batch W15, Makrwatch has experienced explosive growth, reporting 100%+ year-over-year increases. Currently, they process between $2M and $5M in billings and collaborate with creators across over 60 countries. With a fully remote team of 20 members spanning six countries, their objectives include reaching $20M in billings and facilitating 10,000 sponsored videos within the next 18 months.

**Team & Location**: Located in New York, the company's 20 diverse team members contribute to a vibrant creator-focused ecosystem. Their Group Partner is nan.

**Core Services**: Makrwatch operates as a technology-based influencer marketing agency that connects brands with YouTube creators. They offer services that streamline everything from negotiations to contracting, making partnership logistics easy for both brands and creators. Creators can get pitched directly to brands, manage sponsorship contracts, and receive support for content pricing and representation.

**Growth & Vision**: The roadmap for Makrwatch is ambitious yet achievable. With their current trajectory, they aim to solidify their position as a leading influencer marketing agency that not only boosts brand visibility but also nurtures creator relationships.

**Website**: For more information and to explore partnership opportunities, visit [Makrwatch's website](https://www.makrwatch.com).

**Key Tags**: Marketplace, B2B, Social Media, Advertising, Creator Economy, New York.

### Conclusion

In a world where influencer marketing is becoming more significant, Makrwatch has positioned itself as a crucial player. Their focus on efficiency and quality makes them an attractive avenue for brands looking to expand beyond traditional advertising methods, while also providing creators with valuable opportunities to grow their partnerships and income. If you’re a brand seeking innovative ways to connect with your audience or a creator looking for sponsorship, Makrwatch is worth exploring.
